=======================
django-ingredient-field
=======================

Quick start
-----------

1. Add "dj_ingredient_field" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ...
        'dj_ingredient_field',
    ]

3. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create the models.


Documentation 
-------------
https://django-ingredient-field.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?
